comments: so Mean i swear. she doesn\'t help you AND always looks at you like you were stupid and very essay you turn in is a road map when she gives it back to you because she freaking marked all over it. DON\'T TAKE HER! SAVE YOU OWN LIFE AND TAKE SOMEONE ELSE! :(

Had for Fr. Comp. Everything you write might as well be plagiarism. A lot of in class quizzes. She gives you plenty of schoolwork, which is fine. A lot of people, including myself dropped her class after the first essay. I have no advice other than not to take her. It is impossible to receive a good grade because she is a totalitarian grader.

She is very hard. I had her for freshman english and she riped us to pieces. she is very strict when grading and does not care about your feelings in what she writes on your papers. she knows a lot about english and grammar adn expects the student to as well. very hard. i don\'t recommend her.

i consider myself a talented writer and she grades atrociously hard. she is a content-nazi and cares little about style or depth of understanding. she\'s a very sweet lady and will try to help you with your grade but, as has been stated before, she will sometimes write over 1000 words on your papers in red ink. she\'s a nerve wracking prof for sure.
Dr. Lavender helps a lot if you go to her office. Homework after every class. Her comments on your papers can be pretty harsh. Grades very hard.
She is very very hard. Not very understanding. Mean. Grades too hard.

Grades extremely hard, writes more on your paper than you actually wrote and is not polite about it. Takes off points for font when font is not specified. You should be able to write multiple papers for this class at once.
